hiringMixer.title: Remote Hiring Mixer
hiringMixer.subtext: Despite the economy being in the dumps, many of our sponsor companies are still hiring! Apply to multiple companies at once with our Remote Hiring Mixer today!

jobListings.noJobsSubtext: Many of our sponsors are hiring. Their job listings will show up here in the next few weeks.

jobs.title: Staff Software Engineer
jobs.description: @CourseHero needs a technical leader (8+ YOE) with Typescript+React expertise to drive key projects & build a lean, modern, accessible UI to help students graduate! We have a collaborative, learning-focused culture with autonomy and independence to innovate & thrive in a high-growth environment.

jobs.title: Senior Software Engineer
jobs.description: @CourseHero needs a technical leader (5+ YOE) with Typescript+React expertise to drive key projects & build a lean, modern, accessible UI to help students graduate! We have a collaborative, learning-focused culture with autonomy and independence to innovate & thrive in a high-growth environment.

jobs.title: Developer Evanglist
jobs.description: We're looking for a developer who is passionate about teaching other developers. You will be engaging with various developer communities to show them how they can deliver better visual experiences with lower overhead via the imgix API. Your work will have an immediate and tangible impact on a product and community that powers the processing and delivery of image content for some of the Internet's largest sites and most popular apps.
